cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl

类 ImageCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl.SimpleCache<K,V>
      • cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl.PreloadDataCache<java.lang.String,Drawable>
        • cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl.ImageCache
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Cache<java.lang.String,Drawable>, java.io.Serializable

    public class ImageCache
extends PreloadDataCache<java.lang.String,Drawable>
    Image Memory Cache

    It applies to images those uesd frequently, like users avatar of twitter or sina weibo. Cache of big image you can consider of ImageSDCardCache.
      Setting and Usage
    • Use one of constructors below to init cache
    • setOnImageCallbackListener(OnImageCallbackListener) set callback interface after image get success
    • get(String, List, View) get image asynchronous and preload other images asynchronous according to urlList
    • get(String, View) get image asynchronous
    • setHttpReadTimeOut(int) set http read image time out, if less than 0, not set. default is not set
    • setOpenWaitingQueue(boolean) set whether open waiting queue, default is true. If true, save all view waiting for image loaded, else only save the newest one
    • PreloadDataCache.setOnGetDataListener(OnGetDataListener) set how to get image, this cache will get image and preload images by it
    • SimpleCache.setCacheFullRemoveType(CacheFullRemoveType) set remove type when cache is full
    • other see PreloadDataCache and SimpleCache
      Constructor
    • ImageCache()
    • ImageCache(int)
    • ImageCache(int, int)
    作者:
    Trinea 2012-4-5
    另请参阅:

      recommend default max cache size according to dalvik max memory

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ImageCache()
      Get data listener is getDefaultOnGetImageListener() Callback interface after image get success is null, can set by setOnImageCallbackListener(OnImageCallbackListener) Maximum size of the cache is DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE Elements of the cache will not invalid Remove type is RemoveTypeUsedCountSmall when cache is full
      ImageCache(int maxSize)
      Get data listener is getDefaultOnGetImageListener() Callback interface after image get success is null, can set by setOnImageCallbackListener(OnImageCallbackListener) Elements of the cache will not invalid Remove type is RemoveTypeUsedCountSmall when cache is full
      ImageCache(int maxSize, int threadPoolSize)
      Get data listener is getDefaultOnGetImageListener() Callback interface after image get success is null, can set by setOnImageCallbackListener(OnImageCallbackListener) Elements of the cache will not invalid Remove type is RemoveTypeUsedCountSmall when cache is full

    • 字段详细资料

      • DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE
        recommend default max cache size according to dalvik max memory

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ImageCache

        public ImageCache()
        • Get data listener is getDefaultOnGetImageListener()
        • Callback interface after image get success is null, can set by setOnImageCallbackListener(OnImageCallbackListener)
        • Maximum size of the cache is DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE
        • Elements of the cache will not invalid
        • Remove type is RemoveTypeUsedCountSmall when cache is full
        另请参阅:
        PreloadDataCache.PreloadDataCache()

      • ImageCache

        public ImageCache(int maxSize)
        • Get data listener is getDefaultOnGetImageListener()
        • Callback interface after image get success is null, can set by setOnImageCallbackListener(OnImageCallbackListener)
        • Elements of the cache will not invalid
        • Remove type is RemoveTypeUsedCountSmall when cache is full
        参数:
        maxSize - maximum size of the cache
        另请参阅:
        PreloadDataCache.PreloadDataCache(int)

      • ImageCache

        public ImageCache(int maxSize,
          int threadPoolSize)
        • Get data listener is getDefaultOnGetImageListener()
        • Callback interface after image get success is null, can set by setOnImageCallbackListener(OnImageCallbackListener)
        • Elements of the cache will not invalid
        • Remove type is RemoveTypeUsedCountSmall when cache is full
        参数:
        maxSize - maximum size of the cache
        threadPoolSize - getting data thread pool size
        另请参阅:
        PreloadDataCache.PreloadDataCache(int, int)

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        public boolean get(java.lang.String imageUrl,
          View view)
        get image asynchronous. when get image success, it will pass to ImageCache.OnImageCallbackListener.onImageLoaded(String, Drawable, View, boolean)
        参数:
        imageUrl -
        view -
        返回:
        whether image already in cache or not

      • get

        public boolean get(java.lang.String imageUrl,
          java.util.List<java.lang.String> urlList,
          View view)
        get image asynchronous and preload other images asynchronous according to urlList
        参数:
        imageUrl -
        urlList - url list, if is null, not preload, else preload forward by PreloadDataCache.preloadDataForward(Object, List, int), preload backward by PreloadDataCache.preloadDataBackward(Object, List, int)
        view -
        返回:
        whether image already in cache or not

      • getOnImageCallbackListener

        public ImageCache.OnImageCallbackListener getOnImageCallbackListener()
        get callback interface after image get success
        返回:
        the onImageCallbackListener

      • setOnImageCallbackListener

        public void setOnImageCallbackListener(ImageCache.OnImageCallbackListener onImageCallbackListener)
        set callback interface after image get success
        参数:
        onImageCallbackListener -

      • getHttpReadTimeOut

        public int getHttpReadTimeOut()
        get http read image time out, if less than 0, not set. default is not set
        返回:
        the httpReadTimeOut

      • setHttpReadTimeOut

        public void setHttpReadTimeOut(int readTimeOutMillis)
        set http read image time out, if less than 0, not set. default is not set, in mills
        参数:
        readTimeOutMillis -

      • isOpenWaitingQueue

        public boolean isOpenWaitingQueue()
        get whether open waiting queue, default is true. If true, save all view waiting for image loaded, else only save the newest one
        返回:

      • setOpenWaitingQueue

        public void setOpenWaitingQueue(boolean isOpenWaitingQueue)
        set whether open waiting queue, default is true. If true, save all view waiting for image loaded, else only save the newest one
        参数:
        isOpenWaitingQueue -
